item.description:
Before signing up for this event, Please read the entire Write Up and understand and agree to the enclosed Liability Waiver.

Event Rating: Easy
Distance: 3 Miles
Time Duration: ~1.5 Hours
Blaze Orange: not required

Carbuncle Pond-Moosup River is hike #21 in Ken Weber’s book “Weekend Walks in Rhode Island. The pond and most of the surrounding land is in the Nicholas Farm Wildlife Management Area. This area is close to the Connecticut state line, in Coventry, RI.

Our group hikes through Nicholas Farm during Section 6 of the NST. During the hike we will walk on woodland paths, old farm roads, through open fields, and along an abandoned railroad bed. A point of interest to check out during the hike is Spencer Rock pictured below.


The hike is a relatively short 3 miles, and should take 1.5 hours to complete. The land is mostly flat, with some small hills on the woodland trails. Wearing boots is recommended, as there may be wet sections along the trail. As always bring water & snacks.

 

 

 

 

 

Directions: Follow Rt 14 or Rt 117 into western Coventry. Watch for signs for the Carbuncle Pond Fishing Area. This is about one mile west of the junction of Rt 14 & Rt 117. Follow the dirt entrance road until it comes to the pond. Park in the section of the parking lot close to the fishing pier.

Liability Waiver : As a condition of your voluntary participation in this activity you acknowledge and agree to the following: this activity involves inherent risks that can cause property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death to participants and/or others; you assume all risk associated with this activity; you are responsible for having the necessary knowledge, skills, abilities, clothing, and equipment to safely participate in this activity; you know and will follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com; the leader(s) of this activity are volunteers; and you for yourself, your heirs, executors, and administrators release, hold harmless, and indemnify the leader(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death - including those caused by negligence and/or other reasons.


Safety First!
item.how_to_find_us: GPS coordinates of entrance road: N41 42.189 W71 46.483

group.name: Rhode Island Hiking Club " Walks and Rambles "

item.name: Carbuncle Pond & Moosup River (Ken Weber Hike #21)
